item.title: Resume
item.description: David Hein Introduction This project explores the interaction of several different variables related to the ongoing opioid crisis in the United States. There were four different data sets combined. The data sets for opioid prescription rates per 100 people and drug ovdeaths per 100,000 people on a county level in 2016 were taken from the CDC. The data sets for median household income on a county level and percentage of adults lacking a high school diploma on a county level in 2016 were taken from the US Census Bureau.

item.title: Opioid Crisis Part 2
item.description: David Hein Introduction This project explores the interaction of several different variables related to the ongoing opioid crisis in the United States. There were five different data sets combined, four from project 1 and one new data set. The data sets for opioid prescription rates per 100 people and drug overdose deaths per 100,000 people on a county level in 2016 were taken from the CDC. The data sets for median household income on a county level and percentage of adults lacking a high school diploma on a county level in 2016 were taken from the US Census Bureau.

item.title: Exploring the Opioid Crisis
item.description: David Hein Introduction This project explores the interaction of several different variables related to the ongoing opioid crisis in the United States. There were four different data sets combined. The data sets for opioid prescription rates per 100 people and drug overdose deaths per 100,000 people on a county level in 2016 were taken from the CDC. The data sets for median household income on a county level and percentage of adults lacking a high school diploma on a county level in 2016 were taken from the US Census Bureau.

item.title: My Resume
item.description: Dave Hein Contact Info Email: Davidhein67@gmail.com Phone: (469) 585-6136 Education University of Texas at Austin B.S. in Chemistry McCombs Business Foundations Certificate Experience Antibiotics FRI Lab Conducted microbiology research in identifying, extracting, and testing novel antibiotics Designed experiments to investigate antibiotic production in streptomyces bacteria Antibiotics FRI Lab Conducted microbiology research in identifying, extracting, and testing novel antibiotics Designed experiments to investigate antibiotic production in streptomyces bacteria UT Rec Sports & City of McKinney Aquatics Maintained and ensured safety at several large public swimming pools Performed rescue and first aid in adverse situations; CPR certified Activities and Leadership UTeach Outreach Taught hands on science lessons to 2nd grade students at Rodriguez Elementary in Austin ISD Texas Tribe Social and Service Organization Participated in numerous volunteer activities around Austin such as the Central Texas Food Bank and the Inside Books Project Skills Multiple lab courses in Inorganic, physical and organic chemistry.
